Schedule - Class in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.schedule
A local interface for an Aurora schedule.

StatusCodeException.BadRequestException - Exception in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 400 status code response.
StatusCodeException.ForbiddenException - Exception in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 403 status code response.
StatusCodeException.InternalServerErrorException - Exception in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 500 status code response.
StatusCodeException.ResourceNotFoundException - Exception in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 404 status code response.
StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - Exception in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
Thrown when the Aurora controller returns a 401 status code response.
StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - Exception in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi
Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 422 status code response.
